pages.title: Emerald Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Emerald Armour you will need one Infused Emerald per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Emerald goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Emerald Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Emerald Armour to Gain a Permenant Speed Boost
